title: France
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,019 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 850L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and Z
description: France will take students to the most visited country in the world. In the book, they will learn about the history, art, and culture of this amazing country, along with some celebrations and food that France is famous for. Colorful maps and pictures support the text.
